FuncDef: The display port isolate-state command displays information about isolated interfaces.
CLIs: display port isolate-state { all | { vlan <vlanid> | interface { <interface-type> <interface-num> | <interface-name> } } * } [ slot <slotid> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about isolated interfaces with a specified VLAN ID. If an interface is added to two VLANs, vlan vlan-id specifies the outer VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Displays information about isolated interfaces on a board in a specified slot.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check information about all isolated interfaces on a device, run the display port isolate-state command. To check information about a specified isolated interface or isolated interfaces in a specified VLAN, specify an interface or a VLAN in the command.
